column2: "Na Saul kasaa kyerɛɛ ne ba Jonatan
column3: na no nkowaa nyinara
column4: dɛ wonku David. Naaso nna Saul ne ba Jonatan pɛ David n’asɛm dodow."

column2: "Na Jonatan kaa kyerɛɛ David dɛ
column3: M’egya Saul rohwehwɛ eku wo: dɛm ntsi afei
column4: meserɛ wo

column2: "na mubopue mekegyina m’egya ne nkyɛn wɔ haban mu mbrɛ ewɔ no
column3: na menye m’egya atwetwe nkɔmbɔ wɔ wo ho; na sɛ muhu biribiara a
column4: mebɛka akyerɛ wo."

column2: "Na Jonatan kasaa David no ho yie kyerɛɛ n’egya Saul
column3: na ɔsee no dɛ
column4: Mma ɔhen nnyɛ bɔn nntsia n’akowaa David: osiandɛ ɔnnyɛɛ bɔn nntsiaa wo
column5: na afei so no ndwuma a ɔwɔ w’afamu no ye dodoodow:"

column2: "osiandɛ ɔdze no nkwa kitsaa ne nsamu
column3: na okokum Filistianyi no
column4: na EWURADZE dzii konyim kɛsenara maa Israel nyinara: ɔwoara hunii
column5: na idzii dɛw: ɔyɛ dɛn ntsi mbom na ebɛyɛ bɔn etsia bɔgya a onndzi fɔ
column6: dɛ iboku David gyan ara gyan yi?"

column2: "Na Saul tsiee Jonatan ne ndze: na Saul kaa ntam dɛ
column3: Dɛ EWURADZE tse ase yi
column4: wonkoku no."

column2: "Na Jonatan frɛɛ David
column3: na ɔdaa nsɛm no nyinara edzi kyerɛɛ no. Na Jonatan dze David brɛɛ Saul
column4: na ɔbɛtsenaa n’enyim

column2: "Na ɔsa baa bio: na David tui
column3: na ɔnye Filistiafo no kɔkoe
column4: na okum hɔn ku kɛsenara; ma wofii n’enyim guanee."

column2: "Na sunsum bɔn a ofi EWURADZE hɔ baa Saul do
column3: wɔ aber a ɔtse ne fie
column4: na ne peaa dze ne nsamu no; na David dze ne nsa bɔɔ sanku."

column2: "Na Saul hwehwɛɛ dɛ ɔdze peaa no wɔ David ma okitsa ban; naaso ɔtwee noho fii Saul n’enyim
column3: na ɔtoow peaa no ma ɔkɔwɔɔ ban no mu: na David guanee
column4: na ofii nsa anadwe no."

column2: "Na Saul somaa abɔfo ma wɔkɔr David ne fie dɛ wɔnkɛtsɛw no
column3: na wonku no anapa no: na David ne yer Mikal kaa kyerɛɛ no dɛ
column4: Sɛ anngye woho nkwa anadwe yi a

column2: "Nna Mikal dze David duaa tokura mu sii famu: na oguanee kɔree
column3: na ofii nsa."

column2: "Na Mikal faa ohonyi na ɔdze too mpa no do
column3: na ɔdze mpɔnkyenhwi sundze too n’etsifi
column4: na ɔdze tam no kataa do."

column2: "Na aber a Saul somaa abɔfo dɛ wɔnkɛfa David no
column3: ɔsee dɛ
column4: Ɔyar."

column2: "Na Saul somaa abɔfo no dɛ wɔnkɔhwɛ David
column3: na ɔsee dɛ: Wɔmfa no wɔ mpa no do mbrɛ me
column4: ma munku no."

column2: "Na ɔbɔfo no baa dan mu no
column3: hwɛ
column4: ohonyi na ɔda mpa no do
column5: ɔnye mpɔnkyenhwi sundze no wɔ n’etsifi."

column2: "Na Saul see Mikal dɛ
column3: Ɔyɛ dɛn ntsi na adaadaa me dɛm yi
column4: na ama me tamfo kɔ ma oefi nsa yi? Na Mikal buaa Saul dɛ
column6: Ma monkɔ; ebɛn ntsi na munku wo?"

column2: "Na David guanee
column3: na ofii nsa
column4: na ɔbaa Samuel nkyɛn wɔ Rama
column5: na ɔbɛkaa dza Saul dze ayɛ no nyinara kyerɛɛ no. Na ɔno na Samuel kɔree kɛtsenaa Naiot."

column2: "Na wɔkaa kyerɛɛ Saul dɛ
column3: Hwɛ
column4: David wɔ Naiot wɔ Rama."

column2: "Na Saul somaa abɔfo dɛ wɔnkɛfa David: na aber a wohun nkɔnhyɛfo kuw no dɛ wɔrehyɛ nkɔm
column3: na Samuel gyina hɔ dɛ ɔrohwɛ hɔn do no
column4: Nyankopɔn no sunsum baa Saul n’abɔfoe no hɔn do

column2: "Na wɔkɛkaa kyerɛɛ Saul no
column3: ɔsomaa abɔfo fofor
column4: na hɔn so wɔhyɛɛ nkɔm. Na Saul somaa abɔfo bio a otsia ebiasa na hɔn so wɔhyɛɛ nkɔm."

column2: "Na ɔnoara so sii mu kɔr Rama
column3: na ɔbaa bura kɛse a ɔwɔ Seku ne nkyɛn: na obisaa dɛ
column4: Samuel na David wɔwɔ henfa? Na obi see dɛ

column2: "Na ɔkɔr Naiot hɔ wɔ Rama: na Nyankopɔn no sunsum no baa ɔno so no do
column3: na ɔrokɔ no
column4: na ɔhyɛɛ nkɔm ara dze kodur dɛ ɔbaa Naiot wɔ Rama."

column2: "Na ɔno so pɔɔr ne ntar
column3: na ɔno so hyɛɛ nkɔm wɔ Samuel n’enyim
column4: na odzii adagyaw daa hɔ adzekyee no nyinara na adzesaa no nyinara. Dɛm ntsi na wɔka dɛ
column5: Ana Saul so dɔm nkɔnhyɛfo no a?"
